definitions.definition: The state of being productive , fertile , or efficient .
The rate at which goods or services are produced by a standard population of workers ; those workers' degree of efficiency.
examples: You can see the computer age everywhere but in the productivity statistics.

definitions.definition: The rate at which crops are grown on a standard area of land .
The ability to form new words using established patterns and discrete linguistic elements, such as the derivational affixes -ness and -ity ; the degree to which such formation happens.

main_definition: The state of being productive , fertile , or efficient .
secondary_definitions: The rate at which goods or services are produced by a standard population of workers ; those workers' degree of efficiency.
The rate at which crops are grown on a standard area of land .

( linguistics ) The ability to form new words using established patterns and discrete linguistic elements, such as the derivational affixes -ness and -ity ; the degree to which such formation happens.
